issue.body:

While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. issue.title: book.hacktricks.xyz
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://book.hacktricks.xyz/network-services-pentesting/pentesting-web/artifactory-hacking-guide](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbook.hacktricks.xyz%2Fnetwork-services-pentesting%2Fpentesting-web%2Fartifactory-hacking-guide) ### Comment > This developer is using my Twitter, email , my devices back when I was ill with cancer . I paid for every device , software, ivr had 10 phones the last year . This is causing emotional distress . I've called Microsoft Google yahoo,samsung ,the police , and everyone thought I lied . It tool a data leak,and a year later I finally found out how they were getting in . I don't understand why you couldn't see the all the red flags , password changed , deleted or deactivated accounts I have screen recordings also . Please please tell me thatcthi Username: `@Babieluv777 ` ### Screenshots

issue.title: twitter.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://twitter.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Ftwitter.com) ### Comment > Ads now appearing in X (Twitter). I’ve previously reported (twice) that ads are appearing in Facebook.com and both times the issue has been closed, but not yet fixed, Username: `@Shaz99-99` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/gsqnlyz3y48wkswcccgccwk0owkc4own4poigpn540.jpg?nc=1)

comment.body:
> @abidjauhar17 Don't worry, I was using another link. Try `tikmate.app#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'powerAPITag', 'emptyObj')`

yeah thank you. it works
Now just wait for the rule to be filled into the AdGuard Base filter

comment.body:
@abidjauhar17 
Don't worry, I was using another link.
Try
`tikmate.app#%#//scriptlet('set-constant', 'powerAPITag', 'emptyObj')`
